name: Cool Guys Don't Look at Explosions!
name_original: Cool Guys Don't Look at Explosions!
description:
Cool guys don't look at explosions, the more you ignore it the cooler you look!

Navigate the cool guy around the screen and try to avoid looking at any of the many many explosions happening all around you. 

Why are there explosions? You're too cool to care.

How to play:

Arrow keys to move

Spacebar to quick turn

Escape to pause

Don't look at explosions to build your coolometer combo for more points

Game over when you are caught in an explosion

Music:

PJ Kimber (spotify)
